list.description: Casino App Players are evenly distributed across genders. Love for casino apps seems to increase with age, as the largest percentage of this audience can be found in the 45-55+ age groups.
Sports Fans can be found across all age groups, but are predominantly men with a fairly even distribution across incomes.
E-Sports Fans are usually men. Over 75% of this audience are in the 18-24-year-old and 25-34-year-old age ranges.

College Sports Fans are typically men across all age groups. Their household incomes are usually high, with 44% of this audience in the over $100k HHI set. This audience will likely own team-specific apps that align with their alma mater.
Fantasy Sports Players skew significantly toward men. Their age group ranges from 25-44 years old.
Casino Visitors are evenly distributed across genders. This audience tends to fall into two age categories: 25-34 years old and 35-44 years old.
Mobile Gamers are evenly distributed across genders. They are in the 35-44-year-old, 45-54-year-old, and 55+-year-old age groups.
Card & Boardgame Gamers are evenly distributed across genders and tend to be 55+ years old.
